## Using services identified by URL

```{r}
prg <- CzechData::load_RUIAN_settlement(pragr::prg_kod)
```


```{r}
ggplot2::ggplot() +
  prg_basemap(prg,image_service = "http://mpp.iprpraha.cz/arcgis/rest/services/GEO/IG_mapy/MapServer", buffer = 100)
```
